docs.lead_paragraph: The "Nixon Court" left a clear imprint last week In still another case involving the power of police and prosecutors: The Court wrote a major exception into the exclusionary rule that bars the use of illegally obtained evidence in criminal proceedings.

headline.main: Ideas & Trends; Scientists Plan A Whale-Tapping Investigation

docs.abstract: comment on US Sup Ct decision allowing use by grand jury of illegally obtained evidence in criminal proceedings (M)
